Plot: Coverage of the opening ceremony of the 2016 Summer Olympic Games in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, as over 78,000 people gather to watch an elaborate show of dance, music and unity.
Title: Rio 2016 Olympic Games Opening Ceremony
Writer: Rosa Magalhães, Fernando Meirelles, Daniela Thomas, Andrucha Waddington
Director: Fernando Meirelles, Daniela Thomas, Andrucha Waddington
Actors: Anitta, Thomas Bach, Gisele Bündchen, Flávio Canto
